name: MISSION LENDERS WORKING GROUP
description: a network of small business lenders that are SBA certified Community Advantage lenders
sampleDescriptions: providing information to members of congress on the impact of SBA community advantage lending and the work of CA lenders in communities accross the country.

Advocacy aimed at making the SBA's Community Advantage (CA) pilot program a fully authorized SBA program under the SBA 7a loan guarantee program. Currently no active legislation.
